main_definition: To hold or have something within, to include as part of a whole.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To hold or keep (something) within a space or limits.
meanings_and_examples.example: This bottle can contain up to 500 milliliters of water.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To include as part of something, often with the implication that it is an essential component or feature.
meanings_and_examples.example: The package contains a variety of snacks and beverages for your convenience.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To have within one's power to do or achieve; possess the ability or means to handle something.
meanings_and_examples.example: I can contain my anger in difficult situations, but I may need help to cope afterwards.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To give a measure of the number of items that fit within a space or container.
meanings_and_examples.example: This shoe box contains three pairs of shoes.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In terms of data, to include (data elements) as part of a larger set.
meanings_and_examples.example: The spreadsheet contains information about the sales figures for all products.
